meanings.definition: An extremely large number equal to one thousand multiplied by one million multiplied by one million.
meanings.sent1: The scientist calculated the octillions of stars in the universe.
meanings.sent2: The company made octillions of dollars in profit last year.
meanings.sent3: I have octillions of chores to do before the party tonight.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like octillions of tiny stars lighting up the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The weight of the elephant was equivalent to octillions of feathers.

meanings.definition: A quantity or amount that is extremely large or vast.
meanings.sent1: The ocean contained octillions of tiny fish swimming around.
meanings.sent2: The library had octillions of books on its shelves.
meanings.sent3: I have octillions of reasons to be happy today.
meanings.sent4: The crowd at the concert seemed like octillions of people.
meanings.sent5: The forest was filled with octillions of colorful leaves in the fall.
